ing: 1 (12 fl oz) can ginger ale (such as Canada DryÂ®)
des: "Delightful twist on hot tea. I was given this after having my third baby in the hospital. This tea helps with upset stomachs, nausea, and is just tasty."
ins:
Pour ginger ale into a microwave-safe mug. Heat in the microwave for 1 to 2 minutes.
Steep tea bag in the hot ginger ale for 3 to 5 minutes.
